channel.title: Filezilla,smf Shit this is confusing
channel.description: Hi again. I am pretty much ok with this all now. But but but, I have made my host with awardspace. I have made a login and i got my password from the conformation e-mail. I have filezilla, i have the smf folders. What the hell do i do next. Please would someone be kind enough as to tell me everything. Even using filezilla, i have never used these programs or even attempted anything like this before. Please do help me. Or if you would find it easier Msn would be better. Please contact me on msn. But don't add me for silly reasons please. samma100@hotmail.com

item.title: Filezilla,smf Shit this is confusing
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

You have to login to your awardspace account and setup an FTP account, then you login the FTP account (not awardspace account) through Firezilla… If you still need help just talk to me on msn, I think I’ve already got you added.

Read full topic
